main.name: Yaw-An Shieh
main.description: I convert it into a Typescript version and stop the jQuery library here, and hope this will help you to know me more
main.bio: Hello there, I am a man who loves to solve problems and might forget to get his meal. My favorite sport is snowboarding although I live on an island with a subtropical climate, where is rare to see the snow.
main.contactMessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: Relevant Coursework: Practical Data Structures and Algorithms / Machine Vision and Image Processing Algorithm / Soft Computing Methods and Applications

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Took over and maintained the performance evaluation web application, developed new features in .Net, C# MVC, Vuejs with Bootstrap. It also meant I am worthy of trust for keeping confidential information.

work.title: Software/Firmware Engineer
work.description: I participated in almost all automation projects then, and I was responsible for image process algorithms such as blemish inspection and image quality checking for lens modules. Provided reliable quality control instead of subjective judgments on defect inspections.

projects.title: Resume Website using Typescript
projects.category: A React based resume website template

testimonials.text: I have had the good fortune to have worked with Yaw-An Shieh over the past 3 years in my capacity of Associate Vice President of Software Engineering at PEGATRON Corporation. During this time    Yaw-An has demonstrated deep multi-disciplinary expertise in firmware development and software integration.
